content: सृष्टिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [सृज्-क्तिन्] {@--1@} Creation, anything created; किं मानसी सृष्टिः <ls>Ś. 4</ls>; या सृष्टिः स्रष्टुराद्या <ls>Ś. 1. 1</ls>; स्त्रीरत्नसृष्टिरपरा प्रतिभाति सा मे <ls>Ś. 2. 9</ls>; सृष्टिराद्येव धातुः <ls>Me. 82.</ls> {@--2@} The creation of the world. {@--3@} Nature, natural property. {@--4@} Letting loose, emission. {@--5@} Giving away, a gift. {@--6@} The existence of properties or qualities. {@--7@} The absence of properties.
